name: Culinary And Gastronomy Activities In Madrid
description:
Spain has been put on top of the culinary scene of the world by a number of really famous chefs, starting with Ferran Adria from El Bulli, and continuing with the rest of our wonderful chefs like Arzak, Santi Santamaría, Sergi Arola, Berasategui, Karlos Arguiñano... 
For food and wine lovers we offer popular culinary activities like:
